data.narrative: At 04:27 PM on Wednesday, May 21, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Daniel Rodriguez surveys his bedroom. Sunlight filters through the blinds on the window (window_bedroom_01), casting striped shadows across the room. A queen-sized bed (bed_bedroom_01) dominates one wall, its navy blue comforter slightly rumpled. A worn wooden desk (desk_bedroom_01), cluttered with a laptop and various coding books, sits against another wall. A doorway (door_bedroom_01) is visible, presumably leading out of the bedroom.

Across from his bedroom door is a closed door (bathroom_door_01), presumably leading to the bathroom.

data.details: Open the refrigerator to check its contents.

data.outcome_description: At 04:28 PM on Wednesday, May 21, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Daniel Rodriguez opened the refrigerator.

data.narrative: At 04:28 PM on Wednesday, May 21, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Daniel pulls open the refrigerator door (refrigerator_01), revealing a somewhat sparsely populated interior. The bright light illuminates a half-empty carton of orange juice, a few containers of leftovers, and a collection of condiments. Sadly, no Cuban sandwich to be found. He spots a container of what appears to be leftover chicken and rice (container_01) from a few nights ago.

discovered_objects.name: Leftover Chicken and Rice
discovered_objects.description: A container of what appears to be leftover chicken and rice from a few nights ago.

data.details: Grab the container of leftover chicken and rice.

data.outcome_description: At 04:28 PM on Wednesday, May 21, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Daniel Rodriguez grabbed the container of leftover chicken and rice.

data.narrative: At 04:28 PM on Wednesday, May 21, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Daniel grabs the container of leftover chicken and rice (container_01) from the refrigerator. He closes the fridge door, the hum returning to its normal level. The container feels cold in his hand, a gentle reminder that it's been sitting in the fridge for a few days.

data.details: Put the container of chicken and rice in the microwave and heat it up.

data.outcome_description: At 04:28 PM on Wednesday, May 21, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Daniel Rodriguez heated the chicken and rice in the microwave.

data.narrative: At 04:28 PM on Wednesday, May 21, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Daniel places the container of chicken and rice (container_01) into the microwave (microwave_01) on the counter. He punches in three minutes on the keypad, and the microwave starts humming, filling the kitchen with the faint scent of reheated food. The turntable inside spins the container slowly as he waits.

discovered_objects.name: Microwave
discovered_objects.description: A standard microwave on the counter.

data.details: Open the microwave and take out the container of heated chicken and rice.

data.outcome_description: At 04:31 PM on Wednesday, May 21, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Daniel Rodriguez opened the microwave and took out the container of heated chicken and rice.

data.narrative: At 04:31 PM on Wednesday, May 21, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), the microwave (microwave_01) beeps loudly. Daniel opens the door and carefully pulls out the container of chicken and rice (container_01), now noticeably warmer. Steam rises from the container, carrying a more intense aroma of seasoned rice and chicken. He grabs a fork (fork_drawer_01) from a nearby drawer.
